summary.span: Represents a column in a control.

span.span: Represents a column in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示中的逻辑列控件。The class represents a logical column in a control. 您可以检索通过控件的集合。You can retrieve columns through the collection of the control. 与不同，其中包含实际集合中的单元格，主要用于调整的外观和行为的列的用户界面 (UI)，如列的宽度和单元格样式。Unlike a , which contains the actual collection of cells in a , is used mainly to adjust the appearance and behavior of the column user interface (UI), such as column width and cell style. 有关单元格样式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell styles, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 派生的类型主要用于初始化属性设置为相关类型的新实例派生自类。Types that derive from typically initialize the property to a new instance of a related type derived from the class. 与相关的外观或行为的各个单元格的任何列属性都是模板单元格的相应属性的包装。Any column properties that relate to the appearance or behavior of individual cells are wrappers for the corresponding properties of the template cell. 更改其中一个属性的列上自动更改单元格模板和列中的所有单元格的值。Changing one of these properties on the column automatically changes the value on the cell template and on all cells in the column. 若要重写每个单元格的指定的值，设置单元格的值后设置列的值。To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建使用 Windows 窗体和一组按钮。The following code example creates a Windows Form with a and a set of buttons. 每个按钮标签描述与相关的操作属性，如交换的第一个和最后一列 (使用属性) 或更改列标题的文本 (使用属性)。Each button label describes an operation related to a property, such as swapping the first and last column (using the property) or changing the text of a column header (using the property). 单击一个按钮将更改的关联的属性。Clicking a button changes the associated property of the . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#100](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#100)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#100)]

span.para: 派生自并将新属性添加到派生类，请确保重写方法以在克隆操作过程中复制新属性。此外应调用基类的方法，以便基类的属性复制到新的单元格。

When you derive from and add new properties to the derived class, be sure to override the method to copy the new properties during cloning operations. You should also call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new cell.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode AutoSizeMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets the mode by which the column automatically adjusts its width.

span.span: Gets or sets the mode by which the column automatically adjusts its width.

value.span: 一个值确定该列是否将自动调整其宽度，以及该列将如何确定首选的宽度。

span.span: A value that determines whether the column will automatically adjust its width and how it will determine its preferred width.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列的自动调整大小行为确定的值属性，它是值相同的属性，用于除之外的所有值，指示值继承属性改为。The automatic sizing behavior of the column is determined by the value of the property, which is the same as the value of the property for all values except , which indicates that the value is inherited from the property instead. 当属性值是，以及处于该模式下的其他列已调整列的大小。When the property value is , the column is resized along with other columns in that mode. 控件中的所有填充模式列将由的比例中的可用空间都划分其属性值。All fill-mode columns in the control divide the available space in proportions determined by their property values. 通过减去从控件的客户端区域的宽度的所有其他列的宽度来确定可用于填充模式的宽度。The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control. 如果此宽度小于组合所有填充模式列的值，显示水平滚动条，所有填充模式列在都显示时带有其最小宽度，并且用户列重设大小被禁用。If this width is smaller than the combined values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled. 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 当属性设置为之外的任何其他值，该列将管理其宽度，以使其单元格的值完全显示不经剪辑。When the property is set to any other value except , the column will manage its width so that its cell values are fully displayed without clipping. 在基于内容的大小调整模式下，大小调整单元格内容更改时，或者会发生，启用后，每当行高发生更改时。In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if is enabled, whenever row heights change. 某些基于内容的大小调整模式，可以将限制到当前显示的行的大小调整，以提高性能。Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 只能对列属性值为`true`调整大小，并更改列的可见性不会导致发生调整大小。Only columns with a property value of `true` are resized, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，如果将列设置为自动调整大小，用户不能调整的列宽度，用鼠标。Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse. 若要以编程方式调整列宽度，请使用控件的或方法，或者设置列属性。To adjust column widths programmatically, use the control's or methods or set the column property. 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例将强制列自动调整其宽度以适应其内容的大小。The following code example forces a column to automatically resize its width to fit its contents. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#109](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#109)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#109](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#109)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#109](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#109)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.

value.span: 一个的列中的所有其他单元格都以它为模型。

span.span: A that all other cells in the column are modeled after.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数类初始化此属性。The constructors for the class initialize this property. 默认构造函数将属性设置为`null`; 另一个构造函数将从其参数复制单元格模板。The default constructor sets the property to `null`; the other constructor copies the cell template from its parameter. > [!NOTE] > 更改单元格模板的属性不会立即影响列的现有单元格的用户界面 (UI)。Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells. 这些更改只会明显后重新生成列 (例如，通过对列进行排序或通过调用方法)。These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the method). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用作为模板。The following code example demonstrates how to use a as a template for a . 对列中的任何单元格所做的样式更改会影响所有列的单元格。Style changes made to any cell in the column affect all of the column's cells. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#120)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#120)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户单击列的显示区域中的鼠标右键按钮，将出现快捷菜单。The shortcut menu appears when a user clicks the right mouse button in the column's display area. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性以添加用于更改单元格的背景色的功能。The following code example uses the property to add functionality for changing a cell's background color. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#130)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#130)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#130](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#130)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the name of the data source property or database column to which the is bound.

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the data source property or database column to which the is bound.

value.span: 与相关联的属性或数据库列的不区分大小写名称。

span.span: The case-insensitive name of the property or database column associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，每个列将自动设置其属性设置为指定的数据源中的属性或数据库列的名称属性。When the property is set to `true`, each column automatically sets its property to the name of a property or database column in the data source specified by the property. 此绑定也可以手动，当你想要在数据源中显示的属性或可用的数据库列的一个子集时，这很有用。This binding can also be performed manually, which is useful when you want to display only a subset of the properties or database columns available in the data source. 在这种情况下，设置属性设置为`false`，然后手动添加每个，设置每个值属性或想要显示的数据源中的数据库列的属性。In such cases, set the property to `false`, and then manually add each , setting the value of each property to the properties or database columns in the data source that you want to display. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示如何选择每个列将表示哪些属性。The following code example shows how to choose what property each column will represent. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound/CS/collectionbound.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound/VB/collectionbound.vb#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound/CS/collectionbound.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._CollectionBound/VB/collectionbound.vb#10)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.

span.span: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.

value.span: 一个，表示列中单元格的默认样式。

span.span: A that represents the default style of the cells in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件显示其使用指示单元格的样式的单元格属性，它继承自其他类型的属性的样式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 此列中的单元格，为指定的样式通过属性重写通过指定的样式属性，但通过指定的样式重写， ， ，和属性。For cells in this column, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the property, but are overridden by the styles specified through the , , , and properties. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来设置各列的内容对齐方式。The following code example uses the property to set the content alignment of various columns. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/CS/changecolumnalignment.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewContentAlignment/VB/changecolumnalignment.vb#1)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the display order of the column relative to the currently displayed columns.

span.span: Gets or sets the display order of the column relative to the currently displayed columns.

value.span: 因为它的列的从零开始的位置显示在关联，则为-1 如果带区未包含在控件内。

span.span: The zero-based position of the column as it is displayed in the associated , or -1 if the band is not contained within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同属性，属性对应于当前列的位置显示的用户界面 (UI)。Unlike the property, the property corresponds to the current position of the column as displayed by the user interface (UI). 默认情况下，每个列的设置为按升序排列，这反映了已添加的顺序的数字。By default, each column's is set to numbers of increasing order, which reflects the order in which they were added. 属性值不会影响值。The property value does not affect the value. 若要确定一个列基于其可见性或其他状态的显示位置，请使用， ，或方法的类。To determine the display position of a column based on its visibility or other state, use the , , or method of the class. 在控件中的每个列具有一个唯一值。Every column in the control has a unique value. 值从 0 开始，并按数值顺序继续而不跳过任何值。The values start with 0 and proceed in numerical order without skipping any values. 当你更改列，值对于其他列更改以反映新顺序的值。When you change the value for a column, the values for other columns are changed to reflect the new order. 如果列具有一个关联控件，设置此属性将导致控件重绘自身。If the column has an associated control, setting this property will cause the control to redraw itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性要交换的第一个和最后一列的可视位置。The following code example uses the property to swap the visual position of the first and last columns. 请注意，插入操作发生之前。Note that insertions occur before the . 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#170)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`DataGridViewColumn1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridViewColumn1`. 然后，确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#370](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#370)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#370](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#370)]

summary.span: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the column divider.

span.span: Gets or sets the width, in pixels, of the column divider.

value.span: 分隔符（该列的右边距）的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The thickness, in pixels, of the divider (the column's right margin).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于提供冻结的列和可滚动的列之间的可视边界。This property is useful to provide a visual boundary between frozen columns and columns that can scroll. 额外的优势是当前列的一部分，但是它将采用的关联的前景色。The extra edge is part of the current column, although it will take on the foreground color of the associated . 额外的优势不会扩展用户可以双击自动调整列大小的区域。The extra edge does not extend the area in which users can double-click to automatically resize a column. 若要调整列的大小，用户必须双击分隔线与相邻的列之间的边界。To resize a column, the user must double-click on the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例的第三个列后添加一个垂直边缘。The following code example adds a vertical edge after the third column. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#110](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#110)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#110](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#110)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#110](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#110)]

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the width of the column when it is in fill mode relative to the widths of other fill-mode columns in the control.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the width of the column when it is in fill mode relative to the widths of other fill-mode columns in the control.

value.span: 一个相对于其他填充模式列的控件的填充模式中时，它表示列的宽度。

span.span: A representing the width of the column when it is in fill mode relative to the widths of other fill-mode columns.

value.span: 默认值为 100。

span.span: The default is 100.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性值是，以便控件中的所有可见列完全填充可用显示区域的水平宽度以及其他列在该模式下调整列的大小。When the property value is , the column is resized along with other columns in that mode so that all visible columns in the control exactly fill the horizontal width of the available display area. 控件中的所有填充模式列将由的比例中的可用空间都划分其属性值。All fill-mode columns in the control divide the available space in proportions determined by their property values. 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 最大的总和中的所有列的值控件为 65535。The maximum sum of values for all columns in a control is 65535. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 此示例中提供一个更大示例摘自[如何： 设置 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件的大小调整模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-sizing-modes-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Set the Sizing Modes of the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-sizing-modes-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSizingScenarios#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSizingScenarios/CS/sizingscenarios.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSizingScenarios#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSizingScenarios/vb/sizingscenarios.vb#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 冻结列，也被冻结其左侧 （或其直接在右到左的语言中） 的所有列。When a column is frozen, all the columns to its left (or to its right in right-to-left languages) are frozen as well. 冻结和解冻列形成两个组。The frozen and unfrozen columns form two groups. 如果通过设置启用了对列重新定位属性设置为`true`，用户不能将列从一个组拖到其他。If column repositioning is enabled by setting the property to `true`, the user cannot drag a column from one group to the other. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，它几乎等同于属性的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, which is nearly identical to the property of the class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可供的基于内容的自动调整大小功能控件来确定某一列的理想宽度。This property is used by the content-based automatic sizing feature of the control to determine the ideal width of a column. 一个`fixedHeight`的参数值`false`计算列的宽度基于将会获得理想的单元格高度为宽度比率的计算的行高。A `fixedHeight` parameter value of `false` calculates the column width based on calculated row heights that will achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios. 对于换行为多行的单元格内容，必须具有的单元格样式属性值为。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 有关自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列的标头通常用于显示的列标签。The header of a column is typically used to display a column label. 根据当前的值和属性，用户还可以单击列标题进行排序，或选择的列。Depending on the current values of the and properties, users can also click the column header to sort or select the column. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来更改列标题样式和内容。The following code example uses the property to change column header style and contents. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property InheritedAutoSizeMode As DataGridViewAutoSizeColumnMode

summary.span: Gets the sizing mode in effect for the column.

span.span: Gets the sizing mode in effect for the column.

value.span: 在作用于该列的值。

span.span: The value in effect for the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列的自动调整大小行为确定的值属性，它是值相同的属性，用于除之外的所有值，指示值继承属性改为。The automatic sizing behavior of the column is determined by the value of the property, which is the same as the value of the property for all values except , which indicates that the value is inherited from the property instead. 当属性值是，以便控件中的所有可见列完全填充可用显示区域的水平宽度以及其他列在该模式下调整列的大小。When the property value is , the column is resized along with other columns in that mode so that all visible columns in the control exactly fill the horizontal width of the available display area. 控件中的所有填充模式列将由的比例中的可用空间都划分其属性值。All fill-mode columns in the control divide the available space in proportions determined by their property values. 有关列填充模式的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的列填充模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 当属性设置为之外的任何其他值，该列将管理其宽度，以使其单元格的值完全显示不经剪辑。When the property is set to any other value except , the column will manage its width so that its cell values are fully displayed without clipping. 在基于内容的大小调整模式下，大小调整单元格内容更改时，或者会发生，启用后，每当行高发生更改时。In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if is enabled, whenever row heights change. 某些基于内容的大小调整模式，可以将限制到当前显示的行的大小调整，以提高性能。Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 只能对列属性值为`true`调整大小，并更改列的可见性不会导致发生调整大小。Only columns with a property value of `true` are resized, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，如果将列设置为自动调整大小，用户不能调整的列宽度，用鼠标。Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse. 若要以编程方式调整列宽度，请使用控件的或方法，或者设置列属性。To adjust column widths programmatically, use the control's or methods or set the column property. 有关基于内容的自动调整大小的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中调整大小选项](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列将绑定到数据源，如果它是数据绑定的一部分。A column becomes bound to a data source if it is part of a data-bound . 列可以成为数据绑定的一部分如果时列自动创建属性设置为`true`，或者，如果列的属性设置时将列手动添加到。A column can become part of a data-bound if the column is automatically created when the property is set to `true`, or if the column's property is set when the column is manually added to the .

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the column is resizable.

span.span: One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性是，用户将不能手动调整列宽。If the property is , the user will not be able to manually adjust the column width. 默认情况下属性值基于属性值。By default, the property value is based on the property value. 如果显式设置到或，但是，将忽略控件值。If you explicitly set to or , however, the control value is ignored. 设置到还原值继承行为。Set to to restore the value-inheritance behavior. 因为恢复值继承属性将永远不会返回值，除非该列尚未添加到控件。Because restores the value inheritance, the property will never return a value unless the column has not been added to a control. 如果您需要确定是否继承的列的属性值，检查其属性。If you need to determine whether the property value of a column is inherited, check its property. 如果属性值包含标志，不继承属性值。If the property value includes the flag, the property value is not inherited. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此属性以修复第三个列的大小，以便用户不能更改列宽度。The following code example uses this property to fix the size of the third column so that the user cannot change the column width. remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件使用包含的列排序属性值为，排序标志符号将自动显示在列标题。When a control is sorted using a column with a property value of , a sorting glyph is automatically displayed in the column header. 从.NET Framework 4.6 开始，排序标志符号时在调整大小根据系统 DPI 设置 app.config 文件包含以下条目：Starting in the .NET Framework 4.6, the sorting glyph is resized according to the system DPI settings when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ``` 当该控件使用的列进行排序属性值为，必须通过自己显示排序标志符号属性。When the control is sorted using a column with a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 默认排序模式是。The default sort mode of a is . 其他列类型的默认排序模式是。The default sort mode for other column types is . 值不会阻止你对列进行排序以编程方式，尽管其他限制也适用。The value does not prevent you from sorting a column programmatically, although other restrictions may apply. 有关更多信息，请参见 方法。For more information, see the method. 一个属性值为将不会阻止事件发生，但它将阻止标头单击时更改其外观。A property value of will not prevent the event from occurring, but it will prevent the header from changing its appearance when it is clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于隐藏列，同时保持列的视图。Use this property to hide a column from view while keeping the column in the . 若要完全删除某一列，请使用方法。To completely remove a column, use the method. 若要隐藏绑定到数据源中设置此属性时自动生成列事件处理程序。To hide a column that is automatically generated when binding to a data source, set this property in a event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性，它几乎等同于属性的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property, which is nearly identical to the property of the class. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class overview.
